title: Consider the Role of an Appendix
text: An appendix is often used to include information that is too detailed to fit into the main slides.

title: Think About the Main Content
text: The main slides should focus on the key points, while the appendix can provide additional context.

title: Purpose of Detailed Information
text: Detailed information in an appendix supports the main content without overwhelming the audience during the presentation.

title: Avoiding Overcrowding Slides
text: An appendix helps avoid overcrowding the main slides with too much information.

hintAnswer: To provide additional detailed information that supports the main content
title: Identify the Correct Purpose
text: The primary purpose of an appendix is to provide additional detailed information that supports the main content.
choices: To provide additional detailed information that supports the main content
To replace the main slides with more detailed ones
